fixes.name: Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs
fixes.dax_expression: ABS(SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]))
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ABS(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])) to DAX using ABS and SUM. Transformed the column reference to the table-qualified format 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]. This is a measure because it uses an aggregation (SUM).
